title: The Complete Conan Saga - Robert E. Howard.epub
description:
Originally appearing in the pulp fiction publication "Weird Tales" throughout the 1930's, The Complete Conan Saga is the complete collected stories of Conan the Cimmerian as written by Robert E. Howard. This eBook, which is optimized for Kindle, re-tells all 18 stories of Conan. Each story was gathered and are re-formatted, in chronological order, as they were from 1932 to 1936.

This one of a kind compilation includes an active table of contents and original artwork to include a map of the Hyborian Age, to fully immerse the reader in the world of Conan.

Stories included:

2. The Scarlet Citadel (Jan 1933) 
3. The Tower Of The Elephant (Mar 1933) 
4. Black Colossus (Jun 1933) 
5. Xuthal Of The Dusk (The Slithering Shadow)(Sep 1933) 
6. The Pool Of The Black One (Oct 1933) 
7. Rogues In The House (Jan 1934) 
8. Gods Of The North (Mar 1934) 
9. Iron Shadows In The Moon (Apr 1934) 
10. Queen Of The Black Coast (May 1934) 
11. The Devil In Iron (Aug 1934) 
12. The People Of The Black Circle (Sep-Oct 1934) 
13. A Witch Shall Be Born (Dec 1934) 
14. Jewels Of Gwahlur (Mar 1935) 
15. Beyond The Black River (May-Jun 1935) 
16. Man-Eaters Of Zamboula (Nov 1935) 
17. The Hour Of The Dragon (Dec 1935-Apr 1936) 
18. Red Nails (Jul-Oct 1936)
